title: 04/20/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
itunes:title: 04/20/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
description:
Chris Simms tells Dan that he is most intrigued with what Atlanta does in the NFL draft. Chris says if he was picking for Atlanta he would pick Kyle Pitts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
